com.sudoplay.axion.stream

Class CharacterEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sudoplay.axion.stream.CharacterEncoder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModifiedUTFCharacterEncoder

    public class CharacterEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    The CharacterEncoder provides read and write methods to decode and encode strings using the Charset given in its constructor.
    Author:
    Jason Taylor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected CharacterEncoder(java.nio.charset.Charset newCharset)
      Creates a new CharacterEncoder with the Charset given.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.lang.String read(AxionInputStream in)
      Reads and returns a string from the given AxionInputStream using the Charset set with the constructor.
      protected void write(AxionOutputStream out, java.lang.String data)
      Writes the given string to the given AxionOutputStream using the Charset set with the constructor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
